cards.name: Agamotto
cards.ability: Game Start: Shuffle 4 <mark>Ancient Arcana</mark> into your deck.

cards.name: Araña
cards.ability: Activate: After you play your next card, give it +1 Power and move it to the right.

cards.name: Astral Projection
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the text of an On Reveal card in your hand.

cards.name: Captain Carter
cards.ability: Ongoing: Add this card's Power to your back-row cards here. (can't add to itself)

cards.name: Clea
cards.ability: After this card permanently gains Power, add a <mark>Flames Of The Faltine</mark> to your hand. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Dormammu
cards.ability: Game Start: Begin a Summoning Ritual. (Add the first step to hand.)

cards.name: Dum Dum Dugan
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your front-row cards here have +1 Power. (can't add to itself)

cards.name: Elixir
cards.ability: On Reveal: One of your cards destroyed last turn gets revived here.

cards.name: Flames of the Faltine
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict an enemy card here with -2 Power. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Galacta
cards.ability: Each turn, the first card you play at another location reveals with +3 Power.

cards.name: Goliath
cards.ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each other Ongoing card you have in play.

cards.name: Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

cards.name: Hydra Stomper
cards.ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each time one of your cards moved this game.

cards.name: Infinity Ultron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add 2 of <mark>Ultron's Stones</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: Iron Patriot
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a random 4, 5, or 6-Cost card to your hand. If you’re winning here after next turn, give it -3 Cost.

cards.name: Jennifer Kale
cards.ability: Activate: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

cards.name: Kahhori
cards.ability: On Reveal: Each card in your hand gives one of your cards in play +1 Power.

cards.name: Merlin
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, add a <mark>Wizardly Incantation</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: Morgan le Fay
cards.ability: On Reveal: Return all your discarded and destroyed cards to hand with +3 Power.

cards.name: Nicholas Scratch
cards.ability: After you play a Skill, +1 Power.

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace the text of each card in your hand with that of a random card that costs the same amount.

cards.name: Omniversal Presence
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace this location with a new one and give Merlin +2 Power. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Once and Future
cards.ability: On Reveal: Shuffle your lowest-Power other card here into your deck to get +2 Energy next turn. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Pixie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Shuffle the base Costs of all cards in your deck that started there.

cards.name: Polymorph
cards.ability: On Reveal: Transform your other lowest-Power card here into one that costs 2 more. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Sauron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your hand and deck.

cards.name: Strange Supreme
cards.ability: Gains +2 Power from merging. End of Turn: Merge one of your created cards into this.

cards.name: Summoning Ritual #1
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge your highest-Power destroyed card with Dormammu to continue the ritual. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Summoning Ritual #2
cards.ability: On Reveal: Dormammu steals 1 Power from EACH other card here to continue the ritual. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Summoning Ritual #3
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy 2 of your other cards here to summon Dormammu. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Tao Mandala
cards.ability: On Reveal: Your characters here copy the text of one of your Ongoing cards here. (Banish this.)

cards.name: The Ancient One
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a <mark>Tao Mandala</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: The First Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-Power card from your hand. Remove that card's Power from this.

cards.name: Ultron Mind Stone
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

cards.name: Ultron Time Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Put a card from your hand here.

cards.name: Ultron Power Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Double Infinity Ultron’s Power.

locations.name: Astral Plane
locations.ability: After this turn, add a 0-Power copy of a card from hand here.

locations.name: Camelot
locations.ability: After turn 5, set all cards here to 5 Power.

locations.name: Sakaar Grand Prix
locations.ability: After turn 4, the winner here gets +1 Max Energy.

locations.name: Genosha
locations.ability: After turn 5, all but your highest-Cost here are destroyed.

items.title: High Voltage
items: The ultra fast game mode with three turns and tons of energy returns. Play and unlock Dum Dum Dugan, for FREE!
